title: My projects
subtitle: A selection of all my projects

projectDescriptions.mitigation: A data visualization on greenhouse gas (GHG) mitigation options for agriculture and land use in different countries. Tip: Select China for all functionalities
projectDescriptions.jestTesting: A way to test full datasets with JEST (e.g., 3 seconds for 3,500 tests)
projectDescriptions.portfolio: A portal to showcase my work, host my own blog posts, including translation and CMS capabilities
projectDescriptions.pagination: Custom hook to create pagination for any list of items
projectDescriptions.useResponsive: Custom hook to detect the current breakpoint allowing to render different components based on the screen size
projectDescriptions.useAnimatedValue: Custom hook to animate values with Framer Motion, allowing to animate numbers
projectDescriptions.esdr: This is a data visualization to showcase the performance of European countries towards the UN sustainable development goals.
projectDescriptions.rawDev: Website dedicated to web development services, so that potential clients can get in contact with rawDev
projectDescriptions.imageOptimization: Automation of image optimization with AVIF, png and WebP formats, so that images are optimized for the web
projectDescriptions.sdgTC: Static website which includes an online library for the SDG Transformation Center, so that people can get access to publications and other resources
projectDescriptions.sdr: This is a data visualization to showcase the performance of UN members towards the UN sustainable development goals.
projectDescriptions.heatmap: A heatmap to visualize specific data points in a matrix
projectDescriptions.benin: A data visualization tracking performance of Benin towards the Leave-No-One-Behind indicators.
projectDescriptions.guithub: A community of guitar enthusiasts to share their passion for music.
projectDescriptions.tickTock: Javascript game to change as many diapers as you can!
projectDescriptions.supplyChain: Generating a supply chain analysis with automation capabilities
projectDescriptions.roi: Generating a return on R&D investment analysis, along with a self-generated report as an output
projectDescriptions.bestPractices: Development of best practices for data analyses and data visualizations in the US Northeast region
projectDescriptions.dataTables: Development of an automated tool to self-generate tables for reports
